title: Peak
lyrics: Treat you like princess, rest in heaven, Diana
Piquin' my interest, she got peak like Montana
England breeds proper girls, where are all your good manners?
Reply with pleasantries, honestly, I can't stand ya
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, you gon' make me turn up on you
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, you gon' make me turn up on you
What you thought of me? Never had me missin' a beat
That's just a view from a cheap seat, they don't want problems with me
Talk used to be cheap, nowadays, it's free
People are only as tough as their phone allows 'em to be
Girl, that could never be me, I found my peace, I'm about to say my piece
You might not agree with me
Been with this boy, yeah, for four weeks
I told her, "Go on a date", all of a sudden, she married
Didn't say get - married
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, you gon' make me turn up on you
Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh
Oh, oh, oh, you gon' make me turn up on you
What I'm sayin', in today really at our big, big age if you're gettin' with someone right now
And you're linkin' them for couple weeks, they should know
This is the girl I kinda want to see, so lemme lock off the ting
But obviously in the world that we live in today is not like that
He is did that, but obviously it takes time
You're chattin' -, first of all you shouldn't have no problems at the beginnin'
It should be like honeymoon (that's what I said, that's what I said)
The beginnin' is always honeymoon season
Yeah, well, you overdo it, and he's overdoin' it, both of you are overdoin' it right now
Yeah, well, alright
